name: Tron Totally Tiny Arcade mod
description:
This is a Tron Mod of the awesome totally tiny arcade game (Created by: Joe Lesko, Music by: Makke, 2013) Modding is possible through contacting the author.
I've changed graphics, sounds, music to reflect the 35th anniversary of Tron and a tribute to this game which is one of my all time favs.
Work in progress to replace all NPC's and the endings and tweak the main player character to be more tron uprising style (Great series).
Recommended to run the Joy to key for your joypad and music on 100% for the tracks to kick in.
